statements: SELECT * FROM ManufacturingEmissions;
SELECT process_name, emission_amount FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT id, process_name, emission_type FROM ManufacturingEmissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT process_name, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emissions FROM ManufacturingEmissions GROUP BY process_name;
SELECT id, process_name, emission_type, emission_amount, emission_date FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT process_name, emission_date, emission_amount FROM ManufacturingEmissions ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE emission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND emission_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, process_name, emission_type, emission_amount FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 100 ORDER BY emission_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_name, emission_factor FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_id, process_name, emission_factor FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE emission_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT process_name, SUM(emission_quantity) AS total_emission FROM manufacturing_processes JOIN emissions_data ON manufacturing_processes.process_id = emissions_data.process_id GROUP BY process_name;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_name, emission_factor FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE emission_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY process_name ASC;

SELECT data_id, process_name, emission_quantity, date FROM emissions_data JOIN manufacturing_processes ON emissions_data.process_id = manufacturing_processes.process_id WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT process_name, AVG(emission_quantity) AS avg_emission, MAX(emission_quantity) AS max_emission FROM emissions_data JOIN manufacturing_processes ON emissions_data.process_id = manufacturing_processes.process_id GROUP BY process_name HAVING AVG(emission_quantity) > 100;

SELECT process_name, COUNT(*) AS num_entries FROM emissions_data JOIN manufacturing_processes ON emissions_data.process_id = manufacturing_processes.process_id GROUP BY process_name HAVING num_entries >= 10 ORDER BY num_entries DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT product_name, carbon_footprint FROM products WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT tracking_id, date, emission_amount FROM emissions_tracking ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT process_name, emission_rate FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE emission_rate < 0.5;
SELECT product_name, emission_amount FROM products JOIN emissions_tracking ON products.product_id = emissions_tracking.product_id;
SELECT product_name, carbon_footprint FROM products ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT process_name, SUM(emission_rate) AS total_emission FROM manufacturing_processes GROUP BY process_name;
SELECT * FROM emissions_tracking WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT MAX(carbon_footprint) AS max_carbon_footprint, MIN(carbon_footprint) AS min_carbon_footprint FROM products;

SELECT process_name, product_name, emission_amount FROM manufacturing_processes JOIN products ON manufacturing_processes.process_id = products.process_id JOIN emissions_tracking ON products.product_id = emissions_tracking.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Companies;
SELECT company_id, company_name FROM Manufacturing_Companies WHERE industry_type = 'Automotive';
SELECT plant_location, carbon_emission FROM Manufacturing_Plants ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT process_name, emission_amount FROM Process_Records WHERE emission_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY emission_amount ASC;
SELECT company_name, reduction_goal, reduction_deadline FROM Emission_Reduction_Plans WHERE reduction_goal > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC, industry_type ASC;
SELECT company_name, industry_type FROM Manufacturing_Companies WHERE industry_type = 'Automotive' ORDER BY company_name ASC;

SELECT Manufacturing_Companies.company_name, Manufacturing_Plants.plant_location, Manufacturing_Plants.carbon_emission FROM Manufacturing_Companies JOIN Manufacturing_Plants ON Manufacturing_Companies.company_id = Manufacturing_Plants.company_id WHERE Manufacturing_Companies.company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Process_Records WHERE emission_amount > 100 ORDER BY emission_amount DESC, emission_date ASC;

SELECT Manufacturing_Companies.company_name, Emission_Reduction_Plans.reduction_goal, Emission_Reduction_Plans.reduction_deadline FROM Manufacturing_Companies JOIN Emission_Reduction_Plans ON Manufacturing_Companies.company_id = Emission_Reduction_Plans.company_id WHERE Emission_Reduction_Plans.reduction_goal < 50;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Company;
SELECT Name, Location FROM Manufacturing_Company WHERE ID = 1;
SELECT Product_ID, Name, Type FROM Product WHERE Manufacturing_Company_ID = 2 ORDER BY Product_ID DESC;
SELECT Emission_ID, CO2_Emissions, Date_Recorded FROM Emissions WHERE Product_ID = 5 AND CO2_Emissions > 100;
SELECT Employee_ID, Name, Department FROM Employee WHERE Manufacturing_Company_ID = 3 ORDER BY Name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Company WHERE Location = 'California';
SELECT Product.Name, Emissions.CO2_Emissions, Emissions.Date_Recorded FROM Product JOIN Emissions ON Product.Product_ID = Emissions.Product_ID WHERE Emissions.CO2_Emissions > 1000;

SELECT Employee.Name AS EmployeeName, Manufacturing_Company.Name AS CompanyName FROM Employee JOIN Manufacturing_Company ON Employee.Manufacturing_Company_ID = Manufacturing_Company.ID ORDER BY Employee.Department DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Manufacturing_Company.Name, COUNT(Product.Product_ID) AS ProductCount FROM Manufacturing_Company LEFT JOIN Product ON Manufacturing_Company.ID = Product.Manufacturing_Company_ID GROUP BY Manufacturing_Company.Name HAVING ProductCount > 3;

SELECT Manufacturing_Process.Process_Name, AVG(Manufacturing_Process.Energy_Consumption) AS AvgEnergyConsumption FROM Manufacturing_Process GROUP BY Manufacturing_Process.Process_Name ORDER BY AvgEnergyConsumption DESC;
